name: Bumper Tanks
description:
We’re an independent studio aiming to create magical experiences through games that we’re developing. Bumper Tanks is an internal game jam project that we were excited to develop. BUMPER TANKS is currently in an early development stage, so pretty much everything in the game might change in the future. We are a small team and we are working on the game in our spare time.

Join our Discord server to take part in the future of the game, plus get access to early development updates.

Official Links
Discord : https://discord.gg/vsRAeQgqYy

NOTE : MacOS and LINUX
Please keep in mind that MacOS and Linux builds are experimental if you encounter any issues let us know on the discord. Enjoy!
